short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform New Tab with amazing new design

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the future of browsing with "Searchany," the Chrome extension that reimagines your new tab experience. Revolutionize the way you interact with the web by turning your new tab into an innovative hub that seamlessly combines the power of web searching with essential timekeeping features.

Key Features:

üöÄ Reinvented New Tab: Say goodbye to the ordinary new tab page. "Searchany" introduces a dynamic, customizable dashboard that marries functionality and aesthetics, providing you with a fresh and exciting way to start your web journeys.

üïí Time at a Glance: Keep track of time effortlessly with an elegant clock display right on your new tab. No need to switch between tabs or devices ‚Äì your essential timekeeping information is always a glance away.

üîç Effortless Web Searching: Whether it's information, answers, or inspiration you seek, "Searchany" has you covered. Perform quick web searches directly from your new tab, ensuring that you're always just a click away from the knowledge you need.
